attributes.action: Stop abortion advertising on the television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abortion is the easy way out and the young and general public need to be educated on the consequences of having sex. 
The government need to take action to help unite families and lower the pregnancy rate by raising the moral standards in this country.
Abortion is murder.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop abortion advertising on the television."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23036


Prime Minister's Office
